languages.text: Высеченное на рукояти имя почти стерлось. Этот дробовик принадлежал члену Адептус Арбитес, и, судя по сколам и вмятинам, сослужил ему долгую и верную службу, упокоив не одну сотню правонарушителей.

traits.locale_text: Высеченное на рукояти имя почти стерлось. Этот дробовик принадлежал члену Адептус Арбитес, и, судя по сколам и вмятинам, сослужил ему долгую и верную службу, упокоив не одну сотню правонарушителей.

languages.text: The name on the grip of this shotgun has all but faded. This weapon once belonged to a member of the Adeptus Arbites. Judging by the many chips and dents, it served them long and well by ending the lives of hundreds of Lex violators.
languages.original_text: Высеченное на рукояти имя почти стерлось. Этот дробовик принадлежал члену Адептус Арбитес, и, судя по сколам и вмятинам, сослужил ему долгую и верную службу, упокоив не одну сотню правонарушителей.

traits.locale_text: The name on the grip of this shotgun has all but faded. This weapon once belonged to a member of the Adeptus Arbites, and judging by the many chips and dents, it served them long and well by ending the lives of hundreds of Lex violators.

The name on the grip of this shotgun has all but faded. This weapon once belonged to a member of the Adeptus Arbites. Judging by the many chips and dents, it served them long and well by ending the lives of hundreds of Lex violators.

languages.text: Bu pompalının kabzasındaki isim neredeyse tamamen olmuş. Bu silah, bir zamanlar bir Adeptus Arbites mensubuna aitmiş. Üzerindeki çentik ve ezik sayısına bakıldığında, yüzlerce Lex ihlalcisinin canını alarak uzun ve iyi bir hizmette bulunduğu söylenebilir.
languages.original_text: The name on the grip of this shotgun has all but faded. This weapon once belonged to a member of the Adeptus Arbites. Judging by the many chips and dents, it served them long and well by ending the lives of hundreds of Lex violators.

traits.locale_text: Bu pompalının kabzasındaki isim neredeyse tamamen olmuş. Bu silah, bir zamanlar bir Adeptus Arbites mensubuna aitmiş. Üzerindeki çentik ve ezik sayısına bakıldığında, yüzlerce Lex ihlalcisinin canını alarak uzun ve iyi bir hizmette bulunduğu söylenebilir.

languages.text: Ce fusil à pompe appartenait autrefois à un membre de l'Adeptus Arbites dont le nom inscrit sur la crosse est presque totalement effacé. À en juger par ses nombreuses rayures et bosses, cette arme a fidèlement servi son propriétaire en mettant fin à la vie de centaines de criminels.
languages.original_text: The name on the grip of this shotgun has all but faded. This weapon once belonged to a member of the Adeptus Arbites. Judging by the many chips and dents, it served them long and well by ending the lives of hundreds of Lex violators.

traits.locale_text: Ce fusil à pompe appartenait autrefois à un membre de l'Adeptus Arbites dont le nom inscrit sur la crosse est presque totalement effacé. À en juger par ses nombreuses rayures et bosses, cette arme a fidèlement servi son propriétaire en mettant fin à la vie de centaines de criminels.

languages.text: このショットガンのグリップに刻まれた名前はほとんど消えかかっている。この武器はかつて高等裁定局のメンバーのものだった。多数の欠けやへこみから判断すると、数百人ものレックス違反者の命を絶つのに、長い間よく役立ったのだろう。
languages.original_text: The name on the grip of this shotgun has all but faded. This weapon once belonged to a member of the Adeptus Arbites. Judging by the many chips and dents, it served them long and well by ending the lives of hundreds of Lex violators.

traits.locale_text: このショットガンのグリップに刻まれた名前はほとんど消えかかっている。この武器はかつて高等裁定局のメンバーのものだった。多数の欠けやへこみから判断すると、数百人ものレックス違反者の命を絶つのに、長い間よく役立ったのだろう。

languages.text: 这把霰弹枪曾属于帝国法务部的某位成员，枪柄上的名字已经磨损。从枪身的磨损与凹痕判断，它在前任主人手中立下了汗马功劳，消灭了几百名胆敢违背帝国律法的犯罪分子。
languages.original_text: The name on the grip of this shotgun has all but faded. This weapon once belonged to a member of the Adeptus Arbites. Judging by the many chips and dents, it served them long and well by ending the lives of hundreds of Lex violators.

traits.locale_text: 这把霰弹枪曾属于帝国法务部的某位成员，枪柄上的名字已经磨损。从枪身的磨损与凹痕判断，它在前任主人手中立下了汗马功劳，消灭了几百名胆敢违背帝国律法的犯罪分子。

languages.text: El nombre de la empuñadura de esta escopeta se ha borrado con el uso. En su día perteneció a un miembro del Adeptus Arbites y, a juzgar por sus numerosas muescas y abolladuras, le sirvió fielmente poniendo fin a cientos de infractores de la Lex.
languages.original_text: The name on the grip of this shotgun has all but faded. This weapon once belonged to a member of the Adeptus Arbites. Judging by the many chips and dents, it served them long and well by ending the lives of hundreds of Lex violators.

traits.locale_text: El nombre de la empuñadura de esta escopeta se ha borrado con el uso. En su día perteneció a un miembro del Adeptus Arbites y, a juzgar por sus numerosas muescas y abolladuras, le sirvió fielmente poniendo fin a cientos de infractores de la Lex.

languages.text: Der Name auf dem Griff dieser Schrotflinte ist bis zur Unkenntlichkeit verblasst. Die Waffe gehörte einst einem Mitglied des Adeptus Arbites. Den zahlreichen Kratzern und Kerben zufolge diente sie ihm lange und beendete das Leben Hunderter Gesetzesbrecher.
languages.original_text: The name on the grip of this shotgun has all but faded. This weapon once belonged to a member of the Adeptus Arbites. Judging by the many chips and dents, it served them long and well by ending the lives of hundreds of Lex violators.

traits.locale_text: Der Name auf dem Griff dieser Schrotflinte ist bis zur Unkenntlichkeit verblasst. Die Waffe gehörte einst einem Mitglied des Adeptus Arbites. Den zahlreichen Kratzern und Kerben zufolge diente sie ihm lange und beendete das Leben Hunderter Gesetzesbrecher.
